name: Young Souls
overview: Developed by the talented studio 1P2P, Young Souls establishes itself as one of the most original beat’em ups of these last years. Nervous, rich, tactical, its clever combat system brilliantly mixes combos and strategy: dodge, close combat, ranged shooting, special attacks, parries, dash, ground or airborne strikes... A formula enriched by elements directly borrowed from the RPG universe: upgrading of weapons, skills, and equipment.
